Sign-In.disclaimer: Ne èdi be yeage ɖe eme la, ŋlɔ wò telefon xexlẽdzesi si dze egɔme tso dukɔ ƒe xexlẽdzesi 228 dzi, emegbe nàlé ŋku ɖe gbedasi aɖe tso Impact Stream (Sandbox) gbɔ ŋu eye nàŋlɔ wò kɔdasia ɖe pop-up la me.

Onboarding.heading: Kpe Wò Nyatakakawo Ɖo
Onboarding.disclaimer: Womagblɔ wò nyatakakawo na dukɔa o eye ɖeko woazã wo atsɔ ade dzesi wò eye woate ŋu aƒo ka na wò ne ehiã.

Proposals.heading: Kpekpeɖeŋunaɖoɖo Siwo Wodo Ɖa
Proposals.nullMessage: Fifia la, aɖaŋuɖoɖo aɖeke meli o alo kuxi aɖe le miaƒe kadodoa ŋu.
